room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Red Button Escape in Miami
review: Just escaped the Jewel Heist room, our group had an awesome time! We will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Red Button Escape in Miami
review: We came to Red Button Escape as one of the adventures for my husband’s birthday and it was the best adventure ever. It was our first time doing an escape room and it was phenomenal! From the moment we walked in we were greeted with happy smiling faces, instructions as well as the staff getting us pumped up for our Jewel Heist Room escape.We had 8 people in our group and we failed lol! We were soooooo close though if we would have had 3 additional minutes we would have escaped. We will definitely be back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Red Button Escape in Miami
review: I have done around 15 rooms now. I loved this place. Clean, neat, props were great and room. The Jewel Heist was awesome. Ceiling to wall props and related things. Amazing job! Already booked the second room!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Red Button Escape in Miami
review: This place was awesome. I have done many escape rooms and this was the best by far. My friend and I escaped the Jewel Heist with 2 mins and 40 seconds left with only two people. Great place, can’t wait to try the rest!

room_title: Escape room "Jewel Heist" by Red Button Escape in Miami
review: Had so much fun for my cousin's bday in the Jewel Heist! Definitely hard but we made it!
